channel.title: Trade bug i cant fix
channel.description: 317 pi- whenever someone try's to trade someone it either says "other player is busy at the moment" or "close the shop before trading someone." even though they don't have their player owned shop open.

item.title: Trade bug i cant fix
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Then when the shop is closed in one or more cases you are neglecting to reset their status. So when players leave a player owned shop, close the interface and make sure you set whatever other variable used (viewingShop or inShop or whatever you have called it) back to its original state.

Somewhere along the line you haven’t done this and it still thinks the player is in a shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Trade bug i cant fix
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

happens on the random ever since i added player owned shops

Read full topic

item.title: Trade bug i cant fix
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Does this happen only after you’ve already been in a trade with someone. Or does it occur on the first attempt to initiate a trade?
